column4: hey... how do i remove the GRUB menu? i deleted / uninstalled ubuntu 9.04 but the GRUB menu is still there ..and i tried even with windows cd... but..dont want to install again windows :|
google uninstall grub...i think you want to reinstall the windows boot loader or you'll be left with nothing
when i restart my pc..it shows me what to start.. windows or ubuntu.. if i choose ubuntu..it restarts :| so i must go on windows..
